title: Laser shoes reduce 'freezing' in Parkinson's patients
text:
Laser shoes reduce 'freezing' in Parkinson's patients 8:41am EDT - 01:53
Researchers in the Netherlands have shown how laser guided shoes can alleviate freezing of gait; one of the debilitating symptoms of Parkinson's disease. Matthew Stock reports. ▲ Hide Transcript ▶ View Transcript
Researchers in the Netherlands have shown how laser guided shoes can alleviate freezing of gait; one of the debilitating symptoms of Parkinson's disease. Matthew Stock reports.
